location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of a letter dated 13 October 1815 and confirming that the mares and foals at Bushire will be shipped to Bengal at the earliest opportunity. Bruce also encloses a copy of his letter to the Secretary of the Board of Superintendence dated 4 October 1815.
